metadata.title: CVE-2021-47329 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:megaraid_sas: Fix resource leak in case of probe failure The driver doesn'tclean up all the allocated resources properly when scsi_add_host(),megasas_start_aen() function fails during the PCI device probe. Clean upall those resources.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
